actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

official_title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to exempt tactical military vehicles and engine driven military equipment from certain regulations under the Clean Air Act.

summary.text: Amends the Clean Air Act to direct the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to exempt tactical military vehicles and any engine driven military equipment from requirements under such Act, except those in effect for model year 1984.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to exempt tactical military vehicles and engine driven military equipment from certain regulations under the Clean Air Act.
